Hey, I'm Alberto Alejandro Frontend Developer & Systems Engineer

Born in Venezuela and shaped by curiosity, I've always been drawn to the way things work—especially in the digital world. Over the years, that curiosity turned into a passion for building technology that's both useful and meaningful.
My background in systems engineering gave me a solid foundation in logic, software development, databases, and how systems connect. What drives me most is creating tools that make everyday life smoother and solving real problems with thoughtful solutions.
Although I've grown into a frontend-focused role, I enjoy collaborating on backend design, participating in code reviews, and learning how every part of an application fits together. I'm always learning, always building, and always curious about what's next.

Answers to common questions about my Vue.js/Nuxt.js services, process, and approach.
What technologies do you specialize in?

I specialize in Vue.js and Nuxt.js, building highly interactive, responsive, and performance-optimized web applications. My expertise includes reusable components, Vue Router, Pinia, server-side rendering (SSR), and static site generation (SSG).

I focus on modular, scalable architecture and seamless API integrations. My goal is to deliver blazing fast, modern UIs that work smoothly across all devices, with a strong emphasis on clean code and maintainability.
Can you help with performance and SEO?
Absolutely! I leverage Nuxt.js SSR and SSG to boost SEO and performance, ensuring quick load times and a smooth user experience—even on mobile or slow networks.
What is your process when working with clients?

My approach is client-centered: I listen carefully, communicate clearly, and tailor solutions to your specific needs. I prioritize transparency, regular updates, and collaborative problem-solving throughout the project.
I maintain high standards through clean code, comprehensive testing, and proactive debugging. This ensures issues are caught early, resulting in faster and smoother project delivery.
What is your availability and rate?
My standard rate is $15/hr. I am available for both short-term and long-term projects, and I’m committed to delivering value and results for every client.
What types of projects do you take on?
I work on a variety of web projects, from landing pages to complex web applications. Whether you need a new build, a redesign, or performance optimization, I can help bring your vision to life.
How do you handle API integrations?
I have extensive experience integrating RESTful APIs to deliver dynamic, real-time data in a flawless and responsive way, ensuring your app is both powerful and user-friendly.

Just reach out! We’ll discuss your goals, requirements, and timeline. I’ll provide a clear plan and estimate, and we’ll move forward together to create a high-performance, visually stunning web application.
